about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, I'm Eder Moros, a passionate about building smart and scalable web applications. I'm currently studying a Higher Vocational Degree in Web Application Development and teaching myself various technologies. I plan to transition into the AI and data science industry around 2027.

project3.title: TFG: Web Peluquería
project3.description: A management and booking application for hair salons, developed as a Final Degree Project. It includes an authentication system, service administration, appointment management, invoice handling, inventory, and more.
